title: 为什么我的MC正版启动器打开是这样的？
author: slientmylove
txt_content:
昨天晚上平安夜入正下载了，然后玩不了。然后生成了nativelog的一个文件文件内容：Set run directory to E:\我的世界\正版Native Launcher Version: 286
Operating System: Windows 7 Ultimate
Application Hash: 8f1d31dfea0301cfa2ca7aaedc34da8e9fa25b31
Application Data directory: C:\Users\slient\AppData\Roaming
Executable Path: MinecraftLauncher.exe
App Directory dir: E:\我的世界\正版
Start dir: E:/我的世界/正版
Launcher dir: E:/我的世界/正版/game
TmpDir dir: E:/我的世界/正版/game
Java Launcher hash: f9d59d273807f7b98f8e32d327ac7964481246d4
Java Version: 1.8.0_25
x64: 1
LauncherConfiguration from: https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/launcher.json
Downloaded config
Native launcher is current
Native launcher is current
Java launcher is current: f9d59d273807f7b98f8e32d327ac7964481246d4(f9d59d273807f7b98f8e32d327ac7964481246d4)
Check to see if we can run the launcher
Native launcher is current
runJavaLauncher
Failed to start application ./runtime/jre-x64/1.8.0_25/bin/java.exe -cp E:/我的世界/正版/game/launcher.jar net.minecraft.launcher.Main --nativeLauncherVersion 286
Error message: 系统找不到指定的文件。
这个怎么解决？？

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
文件夹改成英文
比如：我的世界→Minecraft
正版→Minecraft
